question: Is there a formal data security policy in place?
Are there regular security audits to identify vulnerabilities?
Does the organization use encryption to protect sensitive data at rest and in transit?
Are multi-factor authentication (MFA) and strong password policies enforced?
Are employees trained on best practices for data security and cybersecurity risks?
Is there a well-defined incident response plan for data breaches?
Is confidential data automatically logged and monitored for suspicious access attempts?
Are legal and regulatory compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA) incorporated into data confidentiality policies?
Is there a process to securely dispose of or anonymize confidential data when no longer needed?
Are data loss prevention (DLP) solutions implemented to prevent unauthorized data sharing?
Are physical security controls in place to restrict access to servers and data centers?
Are communication channels secured when transferring confidential information?
